A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I believe the title refers to old school fans. We are the last Jedi. I get that Disney wants a universe after skywalker saga\, but they could have given us a much better ending for our beloved characters and still kept their future agenda. Most likely the last Star Wars movie I will ever go to see on opening weekend and just wait to rent it one day on BluRay. I can’t stress enough\, don’t waste your money and don’t support this crap that has become the Star Wars universe. I agree that these movies are making the prequels look like masterpieces. Why is Darth Maul the only legitimate lightsaber fight we’ve ever had? Hire the Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon crew to give us some damn saber battles!
